critter.name: Moth
critter.desc: Many think the moth is strictly a nocturnal creature. Alas, no! These frightful fluttering beasts have been known to haunt the daylight and twilight hours too. Thus, there is no time of day one might escape the moth trait I dislike most of allâ€”those feathery antennae! The mere thought of them gives my feathers goosebumps. And I'm no goose.
